statements: UPDATE satellite_images SET location_name = 'Mount Everest' WHERE image_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE satellite_images SET erosion_level = 3, time_taken = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE image_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
UPDATE satellite_images SET time_taken = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE image_id = 'f95dd372-5862-4a14-bfc9-a2031395ad45';
UPDATE satellite_images SET location_name = 'Mars', erosion_level = 3 WHERE image_id = 'a8c56f81-86f2-47c8-99e0-6cc7f28a9c6a';
UPDATE satellite_images SET timestamp = '2022-02-15 10:30:00' WHERE image_id = '3c434d9f-441d-4dab-b265-5d44c57f53a5';
UPDATE coastal_erosion SET erosion_extent = 0.75, erosion_area = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(40.6892 -74.0445)', 4326) WHERE erosion_id = '7ce1a728-6036-4821-b448-a4884c6f4621';
UPDATE satellite_images SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 13:30:00' WHERE image_id = '96f88181-6ea1-4b84-99c2-6e83f08da6da';
UPDATE coastal_erosion SET erosion_area = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(10, 20), 4326), erosion_extent = 25.67 WHERE erosion_id = 'f4f88b4e-cb49-4033-b1d4-1c428916907e';
UPDATE satellite_images SET erosion_level = 4.5 WHERE image_id = '25b6d7d6-d25f-4a40-8e01-81465d2b36e7';
UPDATE erosion_impact SET impact_level = 3.2, impact_description = 'Significant erosion observed' WHERE impact_id = '39f3c7ca-fd45-4a7d-8a47-325bf8b50c11';
UPDATE satellite_images SET erosion_level = 0.8 WHERE location = 'Mountain A'
UPDATE erosion_impact SET impact_level = 0.6, impact_description = 'Severe erosion due to heavy rainfall' WHERE erosion_type = 'Rainfall'
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg', image_timestamp = '2023-05-15 08:30:00' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE erosion_assessment SET erosion_level = 2, confidence_score = 0.75 WHERE assessment_id = 3;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_url='https://updated_image1.jpg', image_timestamp='2023-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE erosion_assessment SET confidence_score=0.85, erosion_level=2 WHERE assessment_id=5;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_resolution = 'High' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE erosion_areas SET erosion_rate = 0.75, area_size = 500 WHERE area_id = 2;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_resolution = 'High', image_source = 'NASA' WHERE image_id = 101
UPDATE analysis_report SET report_summary = 'The erosion rate has decreased in the coastal area' WHERE report_id = 201
